name: basic_et_al_match
text: Prior work (Baier et al., 2020) supports this setup.
references: Baier, P., Berninger, M., & Kiesel, F. (2020). Environmental reporting in annual reports. Journal A.

name: multi_parenthetical_with_locator
text: The framework follows (Chava, 2014, p. 12; DiMaggio & Powell, 1983).
references: Chava, S. (2014). Environmental externalities and cost of capital. Journal B.
DiMaggio, P. J., & Powell, W. W. (1983). The iron cage revisited. American Sociological Review.

name: narrative_and_suffix
text: DiMaggio and Powell (1983) are cited along with later evidence (Garcia, 2020a).
references: DiMaggio, P. J., & Powell, W. W. (1983). The iron cage revisited. American Sociological Review.
Garcia, L. (2020a). Sustainability assurance timing. Journal C.

name: chinese_nd_inpress
text: 先前研究指出（李明，2020），並延伸至 (Smith, n.d.) 與 (Wang, in press)。
references: 李明（2020）。企業社會責任與公司治理。會計評論。
Smith, J. (n.d.). Sustainability disclosure and reporting. Working Paper.
Wang, H. (in press). Pending acceptance version. Accounting Studies.

name: missing_and_extra
text: Only one source is cited here (Baier et al., 2020), plus an absent one (Chava, 2014).
references: Baier, P., Berninger, M., & Kiesel, F. (2020). Environmental reporting in annual reports. Journal D.
DiMaggio, P. J., & Powell, W. W. (1983). The iron cage revisited. American Sociological Review.

name: ambiguous_same_key_no_false_extra
references: Li, M. (2020). First article on reporting quality. Journal E.
Li, X. (2020). Second article on reporting quality. Journal F.
Smith, J. (2019). Method note. Journal G.
